item.description:
COME LEARN COMEDY!

Many people tell you that you're funny, and you belong on stage, but you haven't got the slightest idea of how to write or perform stand-up comedy.

Professional comedian, Bob Gautreau is going to show us how to be funny and learn stand-up comedy!

This half day workshop will help you develop your personality or "persona," strengthen your comedy writing skills, and emphasize your hysterical delivery through basic exercises you will do in class and at home.

You don't have to be funny to attend. Just have a desire to learn comedy. This is going to be a fun time!

Cost is $59 per person

Time is 12 noon to 4 pm
item.name: Learn Stand-Up Comedy from a Pro
